text: Hernando de Alvarado (d. 1540s), was a Spanish conquistador and explorer, lieutenant under Francisco Vázquez de Coronado. In 1540s Coronado expedition into the American Southwest on August 29 1540 Hernando leading small military unit came upon Acoma Pueblo. ==References== Category:Spanish explorers of North America Category:Spanish conquistadors Category:1540s deaths
title: Hernando de Alvarado
